thread.title: Shahid Kapoor, Alia Bhatt to enter 'Bigg Boss 9' house
thread.title_full: Shahid Kapoor, Alia Bhatt to enter 'Bigg Boss 9' house - Entertainment

author: A Correspondent
title: Shahid Kapoor, Alia Bhatt to enter 'Bigg Boss 9' house
text:
The Weekend episode of Bigg Boss Nau Double Trouble will have the Shandaar jodi Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt bringing some relief for the consistents from all the trouble.
Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt entering the house. 
The duo will be seen going inside the house to have a tete-e-tete with the housemates and play some interesting games. The contestants were delighted to have Shahid and Alis inside the house and gave them a warm welcome.
Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt with the contestants of Bigg Boss Nau 
Shahid and Alia ask housemates to give each other interesting titles where Arvind gets the title of Soya Gennie, Rochelle as the hottest girl while Keith got the hottest guy title. Mandana and Keith were elected to be the best jodi in the house.
Salman Khan with Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt 
Shahid and Alia further will be seen meeting Salman Khan on stage and speak about their upcoming movie. This is the third consecutive time Shahid has appeared on the first eviction episode of Bigg Boss and Shahid tells how this has become a ritual.
Further the episode will also have the Bigg Debate where contestants will be grilled by Salman in the secret room and ask them how there week has been in the Bigg Boss Nau House.
